entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is introduced as a character who raises his hand in a threatening manner. He says 'You shall go now' to Harry Potter.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Mr Malfoy is mentioned as the target of Dobby's threat.

relationships.description: Dobby threatens Mr Malfoy by pointing at him and saying 'You shall go now'.
